(Transformers turning into DBZ? Is that even legal?)


Quickstrike:



Quickstrike watched and followed Rampage on the side. He whispered to 
him: "Are ya slaggin' crazy? Ya bringin' Megatron t' th' ship. Hold 
up, let me get Black Arachnia." He didn't like this. He tried to keep 
his face as calm as he could get it even though he was skittish 
inside.
